name: Winter Woods - Holiday Card 2018
description:
Go for a peaceful walk in the woods and enjoy the winter atmosphere. Catch the fairies with SPACEBAR.

A small interactive holiday card for the Free Wifi podcast winter game jam. Hear more about it here.

See Esteban's card here (spoiler: I like it more than mine): https://estebanfajardo.itch.io/holiday-card

Background music: Seijaku no Tabiji from Girls' Last Tour by Kenichiro Suehiro

Made using Playmaker by Hutong Games

(PC version coming soon)
